results.title: Overlooked No More: Miki Gorman, Women’s Marathon Pioneer
results.abstract: Gorman, who won the New York City Marathon for women in 1977, was the last American female winner until Shalane Flanagan took the title in 2017. She also broke several records in running.

multimedia.caption: Miki Gorman running the 1977 New York City Marathon. She was the first woman to finish the race, and it would be another 40 years until another American woman took the title.
